metadata.title: CVE-2019-14438 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer over-read in xiph_PackHeaders() in modules/demux/xiph.hin VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.7.1 allows remote attackers to trigger aheap-based buffer over-read via a crafted .ogg file.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
